thread.title: Thank you News24!

author: news24.com
title: Thank you News24!
text:
I agree 100% with the decision to disable comments on this site.
One thing needs to be remembered; News24 is a website that brings us news of what happens in our country and around the world.
Surely this must be the main purpose of this site.
However, there are a whole lot of people who abused the option to comment (which I'm pretty sure was implemented for people to give their opinion on the article at hand) by flooding the comments section with insults, racism and discrimination.
A comment is often made with the intention to insult someone else who made a comment and then it becomes a personal battle between two readers.
As it is so easy to comment using a fake profile, there are no limits as to what people say, because they know the chances of them getting into any trouble, because of what they say, are very slim.
I've even see this going up to the extent where people insult a columnist because they don't agree with their opinion. I will most definitely still be a regular visitor of News24, regardless of the final decision.
